promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young epic gecko dark-type pokemon holding a white bow. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptoko, a a chibi young epic gecko dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Tripping Shot. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "dark" or "Cryptoko". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, gecko-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Cryptiko, a nocturnal mini-lizard, thrives in tomb-like habitats. With its Tripping Shot ability, it mischievously trips intruders to protect its lair.
